title: What the Heck Happened in Algarve? First ‘Wrong’ Rider Fesses Up for Farcical Finish
content:
'It's a stupid mistake': Jarrad Drizners claims poor signage caused meme-worthy finish Wednesday at Volta ao Algarve as officials accept responsibility for confusion.

Read the full article at What the Heck Happened in Algarve? First ‘Wrong’ Rider Fesses Up for Farcical Finish on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
